member.name: HistogramGrid
member.summary: The HistogramGrid structure describes the blob format for MF_CAPTURE_METADATA_HISTOGRAM.

member.name: HistogramGrid.Width
member.summary: Width of the sensor output that histogram is collected from.

member.name: HistogramGrid.Height
member.summary: Height of the sensor output that histogram is collected from.

member.name: HistogramGrid.Region
member.summary: Absolute coordinates of the region on the sensor output that the histogram is collected for.
